# spx-slideshow



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                  | Type     | Default                 |
| ---------- | ----------- | -------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------------------- |
| `duration` | `duration`  | Duration of slideshow to complete one cycle. | `string` | `'60s'`                 |
| `gap`      | `gap`       | Gap between inner elements.                  | `string` | `'var(--spx-space-lg)'` |
| `maxWidth` | `max-width` | Max width of inner elements.                 | `string` | `'350px'`               |
